page.title: 17CONCERN FOR FUTURE PLANS
page.content: Mr Graeme McLean of Ballumbie Farm has outline plans for a development which includes a supermarket,a DIY centre,a sports hall, a petrol station, a football pitch and a BMX cycling park.Mr McLean's plans for the development is a good thing but there have been many objections. Local people feel that it would encourage graffiti,litter and drunks. Others said that there had been a lack of leisure and sports centres.Most of the objections came from outwith the Whitfield housing scheme.The Scottish Secretary would have the final say as agricultural land is involved.It could be that there will be a public inquiry over the development.
